---
title: "Why I’m Starting This Blog"
author: "Samridhi Singh"
date: "2026-02-02"
---
I’m starting this blog as a way to think more openly about psychology and research outside the constraints of formal academic writing.

As a student interested in memory and cognition, I often have questions and observations that don’t fit neatly into coursework or lab reports. This blog gives me a space to explore those ideas while also developing a professional online presence.
